post.body: So glad you liked it! I also loved Milk.
Especially me....that's a great story idea, thanks!
What are they saying is the delay Andy???
Can't spoil the secret. :)
Thanks for that info...how about the only 10 app's your iphone needs? I could use some advice. Thanks!
Merry Christmas Miss..and love to all! They'll come home to more..mine! Enjoy!
THe big news is that horrible crash on I270...the driver (suspected of being drunk) drove seven miles in the wrong direction.
Hi Bot...how has your holiday been?
Yes, I'm working. Merry Xmas!!! Glad to know I'm not alone. Plus, handsome Andy Hirsch is sittin' next to me!
I love latkes...enjoy!!
The most compelling "sound bites" are the ones that air...and they've got to be concise...we don't have much time!
wish I was under the covers watching the news! Enjoy!
I'm paying attention, just multi-tasking...oh and I'm also listening to Donna Summer on my IPod & wrapping a preseht under the desk!
Yeah, the weekend's here...yes, time to shop til we drop. Goodnight all.
On the air...anyone have any good story ideas for tonight?
Up for a movie this weekend? 'SlumDog Millionaire' is GREAT! Loved 'Seven Pounds' too. Enjoy!
Hello, anyone out there?? Buehler?????? Buehler???? :)
On the air on this Christmas Day..merry, merry!!! Anyone watchin?
Four more words and I'm headed home. Goodnight all...and Merry Christmas!
I love abba...and disco...o.k. I admitted it. I'll even throw Yanni into the mix!
